Config.Title: 🐞 上报 BUG (Report bug)
Config.Description: 烦请您帮忙指出我们的错误(Please help to point out our mistakes).
Config.Content:
name: ${{name}}
description: ${{description}}
title: ${{title}}
labels: ${{labels}}
body:
  - type: markdown
    attributes:
      value: |
        感谢您能抽出时间填写这个 BUG 表单.(Thanks for taking the time to fill out this bug report!)

  - type: dropdown
    id: os
    attributes:
      label: ⚙️ OS
      description: 您用的是什么系统?
      options:
        - Windows (Default)
        - Linux
        - Android
        - Apple

  - type: dropdown
    id: architecture
    attributes:
      label: ⚙️ Architecture
      description: 芯片指令集是哪种?
      options:
        - Any (Default)
        - Arm64
        - Arm32
        - x64 
        - x86 
        - macOS Rosetta 2
        - LoongArch
    validations:
      required: true

  - type: dropdown
    id: version
    attributes:
      label: ⚙️ .NET Version
      multiple: true
      description: What version of our software are you running?
      options:
        - .NET8(LTS) (Default)
        - .NET7(STS)
        - .NET6(LTS)
        - .NET5
        - .NET Core 3.1(LTS)
        - .NET Core 3.0
        - .NET Core 2.2
        - .NET Core 2.1
        - .NET Core 2.0
        - .NET Core 1.x
        - .NET Framework 4.8.1
        - .NET Framework 4.8.0
        - .NET Framework 4.7.2
        - .NET Framework 4.7.1
        - .NET Framework 4.7.0
        - .NET Framework 4.6.2
        - .NET Framework 4.6.1
        - .NET Framework 4.6.0
        - .NET Framework 4.5.2
        - .NET Framework 4.5.1
        - .NET Framework 4.5.0
        - .NET Framework 4.0
        - .NET Framework 3.5 SP1
    validations:
      required: true

  - type: textarea
    id: what-happened
    attributes:
      label: 📄 请描述您的问题(Describe the bug).
      description: 请清晰简洁地描述您遇到的 BUG (A clear and concise description of what the bug is).
      placeholder: Bug Details!
    validations:
      required: true

  - type: textarea
    id: how-happened
    attributes:
      label: ⭕ BUG 重现(To Reproduce).
      description: 重现步骤(Steps to reproduce the behavior).
      placeholder: Bug Reproduce!
    validations:
      required: false

  - type: input
    id: contact
    attributes:
      label: 📞 您的联系方式(Contact Details).
      description: 如果我们需要进一步的沟通,如何找到您? (How can we get in touch with you if we need more info?)
      placeholder: ex. email@example.com
    validations:
      required: false

Config.Title: ❓ 有使用上的问题来这里提问
Config.Description: For general-purpose questions and answers, see the Discussions section.
